name: Undone (SwedishChefRelliboi)
description:
Made for the second game project at the University of Skövde.

This game is a 2D Platformer with a heavy emphasis on narrative. It features some light puzzlesolving, platforming challenges and a gripping story. Find out more about the world of Limbo as The Poet treks through the lands, discovering more and more about the various people you find along the way. Will you help The Poet reach their love at the end of Limbo?
